review: Update: spent a lot of time on phone with google support.  they could not determine why could not be configured to work from a macbook air running mountain lion...  works fine from an iphone or ipad....I have now spent more than 1.5 hours trying to set this up.  I am very tech savvy and have tried all kinds of "configurations".  Samsung TV show Set Me Up, 4 digit code, name of Chromecast, etc.  downloaded the chromecast setup app.  it finds the chrome cast.  shows that the chromecast is on one of my networks. but then every time get the following message: "We canʼt seem to connect to "ChromecastXXXX." Make sure your Chromecast is powered on and nearby and that you are not on VPN."..... nothing works... rebooting computer, router, etc.  nothing works.  have searched all over the internet and not found any answers....  may have no choice but to return....

review: This device works seamlessly with my setup from tablet to computer to phone. Love how easy and little to no setup is needed. Recommend setting it up on the computer first
author: Casey J. Monson "Casey J Monson"

review: Had a laptop that Netflix and hulu where all I seemed to use it for, ran hdmi cable across the room so I could control from the bed, got his little bad boy and have not had to use my computer at all. Both me and my wife can tie into it from our phones if I leave she can take over and use her phone as the remote. Streaming is fantastic quality, super simple to set up, now supports hulu plus, and I taught my completely technotard mother how to use it, if you can use Netflix on your phone you can use this guy. Just hit one button and blam
